InventoryID: Paestum, from S. Venera (31.5.1976), Lato E, trench IV.
Imagery Description: (a) Two youths, each wearing a white pilos and holding spear and sword, stand one on each side of a large Ionic grave monument with a white shaft, and fillets and offerings on the stepped base. Above to 1. is a suspended halfNon Sepcifiedshield in white and a pendant beadNon Sepcifiedchain with tassel, (b) two draped youths.
